content: Percentile to z-score relationship: Below 50th percentile = negative z-score (below average), 50th percentile = z-score 0 (average), Above 50th percentile = positive z-score (above average). Examples: 3rd percentile ≈ z-score -1.88, 10th percentile ≈ z-score -1.28, 25th percentile ≈ z-score -0.67, 50th percentile = z-score 0, 75th percentile ≈ z-score +0.67, 90th percentile ≈ z-score +1.28, 97th percentile ≈ z-score +1.88.
